title.narrative: Madagascar Emergency Food Security and Social Protection Project

description.narrative: Project's development objective is to strengthen the Recipient’s immediate capacity to respond effectively to the food security andlocust crises, by: (i) increasing agricultural production capacity in Project Areas, while enabling extremely poor households, in the Project Areas, to access cash transfers and cash for work activities; and (ii) improving the Recipient’s capacity to respond promptly and efficiently to an Eligible Crisis or Emergency.

participating-org.narrative: Bureau National, Bassins Versants Perimetres Irrigues

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement: Audit | Description: The Recipient has engaged independent auditors for the purpose of carrying out theProject’s annual audits in accordance with the provisions of Section III of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement. | Due Date:28-Nov-2014

Finance Agreement: FID Project Manuals | Description:The Recipient shall have caused the Project Implementing Entity to revise andupdate the FID Project Manuals (except the Cash-for-Tree Procedure Manual), in form and substance acceptable to the Association,forthe purpose of implementing its Respective part of the Project. | Due Date: 28-Jul-2014

Finance Agreement: National Steering Committee | Description: The Recipient shall establish and thereafter maintain the NationalSteering Committee with composition and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date: 28-Jun-2014

Finance Agreement: PN-BVPI Project Manuals | Description: The Recipient shall revise and update the PN-BVPI Project Manuals, andadopt the Project Implementation Manual, each in form and substance acceptable to the Association, for the purpose of implementingProject activities to be implemented by PN-BVPI. | Due Date: 14-Nov-2014

Finance Agreement: Procurement Complaint handling mechanism | Description: The Recipient shall have established a procurementcomplaint handling mechanism acceptable to the Association. | Due Date:14-Nov-2014

Finance Agreement: Recruiting Project Secretariat staff | Description: The Recipient shall recruit a monitoring and evaluationspecialist and a financial management specialist, each on the basis of terms of reference, qualifications and experiencesatisfactory to the Association and in accordance with the provisions of Section III of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement, tobe assigned to the Project Secretariat. | Due Date: 28-Jul-2014

Legal covenant Finance Agreement: Cash-for-Tree Procedure Manual | Description: The Recipient shall have caused the ProjectImplementing Entity to adopt the Cash-for-Tree Procedure Manual, in form and substance acceptable to the Association, for thepurpose of implementing Part A.2(a) of the Project. | Due Date: 28-Feb-2015
